title: OECD releases guidance on municipal open finance dashboards
summary_250c: OECD note outlines minimal indicators for municipal transparency dashboards and procurement anomaly flags.

title: City X publishes results of participatory budgeting mini-public
summary_250c: Deliberative panel increased acceptance of budget reallocation by +12pp; publishes protocol and survey instruments.

title: CVE-2025-12345 in widely used municipal CMS
summary_250c: Critical auth bypass affecting municipal CMS v4.x. Patch available. Potential exposure for finance portals.
